tool_description: Classifies files into categories based on extensions, MIME types, and content analysis, organizing them into logical groups.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to classify

classification_method.description: Method to use: extension, content, or both

custom_categories.description: Custom category names to include in classification

include_unknown.description: Whether to include files with unknown/unrecognized types

error_messages: Empty file list: Provide at least one file path to classify.
Invalid classification method: Use one of [extension, content, both].
File access error: Cannot access one or more files for classification.
Content analysis failed: Unable to determine content type for some files.
usage: Provide file_paths array and optionally specify classification_method and custom_categories. Files will be categorized into standard or custom groups based on their type.

document_files.description: Array of document file paths (pdf, doc, txt, etc.)

image_files.description: Array of image file paths (jpg, png, gif, etc.)

audio_files.description: Array of audio file paths (mp3, wav, flac, etc.)

video_files.description: Array of video file paths (mp4, avi, mkv, etc.)

code_files.description: Array of source code file paths (py, java, cpp, etc.)

archive_files.description: Array of archive file paths (zip, tar, rar, etc.)

unknown_files.description: Array of files with unknown or unrecognized types

classification_summary.description: Summary of file classification results by category
